item.title: Whats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @Gflo Gflo
item.description:
@Gflo wrote:

it should be all I did was delete the meat(everything after public int[] quests = new int[500]; public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) { if (p == null || p.stream == null) { return; } try {
all the way to)

} catch (Exception error) { error.printStackTrace(); } } }

I might as well go ahead and post the whole thing

/*
 * Class Commands
 *
 * Version 1.0
 *
 * Moday, August 18, 2008
 *
 * Created by Palidino76
 */

package palidino76.rs2.io.packets;

import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import palidino76.rs2.Server;
import palidino76.rs2.Engine;
import palidino76.rs2.player.combat.*;
import palidino76.rs2.player.Player;
import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import palidino76.rs2.content.BountyHunter;

public class Commands implements Packet {
    /**
     * Handles commands, chat text that starts with ::.
     * @param p The Player which the frame should be handled for.
     * @param packetId The packet id this belongs to.
     * @param packetSize The amount of bytes being recieved for this packet.
     */
    public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
        if (p == null || p.stream == null) {
            return;
        }
        try {
			if (p.rights == 2) {
				if (cmd[0].equals("ring")) {
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7927, 1); 
				}
			}	
		} catch (Exception error) {
            error.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

I decided to take out the master command in an effort to make my post shorter. I still get the same error in the same place

Read full topic
